meanings.sent1: The twiny kittens looked almost identical.
meanings.sent2: The twiny dresses were matching in every way.
meanings.sent3: The twiny flowers in the garden seemed to mirror each other.
meanings.sent4: The twiny trees stood side by side like siblings.
meanings.sent5: The twiny siblings shared the same birthday and features.

meanings.sent1: She bought a twiny set of mugs for her and her friend.
meanings.sent2: The twiny shoes were neatly placed next to each other.
meanings.sent3: The twiny socks were always mixed up in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The twiny stars in the sky shone brightly together.
meanings.sent5: The twiny birds flew in perfect harmony across the sky.

meanings.sent1: The twiny vines wrapped around the fence tightly.
meanings.sent2: The twiny branches of the trees intertwined beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The twiny roots of the plants formed a strong bond underground.
meanings.sent4: The twiny rivers flowed side by side through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The twiny ivy climbed up the wall, clinging to each other for support.
